name: Basket knockout
description:
A game about trying to get a lit dunk on your opponent while you are connected by a rope. Dash and hold your position to outplay your opponent and throw them in the hoop in this one keyboard competitive multiplayer.

The controls are as follows:
Player 1:
w, a, s, d to move
space to dash
f to hold

Player 2:
arrow keys to move
, to dash
. to hold

Keep in mind the game was not completed due to a lack of free time during the jam, and will probably be updated after the rating period ends.
